name: Incoming Disaster
description:
You explore the map in search of resources to upgrade your base which is about to be destroyed by a meteorite. 

You only have 5 minutes to collect enough materiales to improve your base level. Meanwhile you must fight against enemies that want to prevent you from surviving.

Once the meteorite falls, the damage is evaluated with a score system that you can overcome in your next game.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click (Hold down) - Shoot
